item.title: 消息人士称，TIM SA正就回购巴西光纤业务多数股权进行谈判
item.description: 知情人士透露，巴西电信运营商TIM SA正就回购其曾控股的光纤网络业务51%股权进行谈判，该交易价值约1.7亿美元。【原文：Brazilian telecoms operator TIM SA is in talks to buy back a 51% stake in a fibre-network business it previously controlled under a deal that could be worth around $170 million, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: TrendForce预测芯片价格在第一季度较上一季度将飙升90-95%
item.description: 市场研究机构TrendForce周一表示，受人工智能热潮推动，已上调芯片价格预测，预计今年1月至3月期间传统DRAM合约价格将较2025年最后三个月上涨90%至95%。【原文：Market researcher TrendForce said on Monday that it has raised its chip price forecasts and expects conventional DRAM contract prices to jump by 90% to 95% in the January to March period of this year, from the final three months of 2025, citing the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 新加坡将成立航天机构以应对全球投资热潮
item.description: 新加坡贸易部周一宣布，该国将于4月1日成立国家航天局，旨在"充分把握全球航天经济增长带来的价值与机遇"。【原文：Singapore will launch its own space agency on April 1 as it bids to "fully harness the value and opportunities of the growing global space economy", the country's trade ministry announced on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚Qoria公司将以6.75亿美元与美国Aura公司合并
item.description: 澳大利亚上市公司Qoria周一宣布将与美国企业Aura Consolidated Group合并，该交易使这家科技公司的估值达到9.72亿澳元（约合6.7564亿美元）。【原文：Australia-listed Qoria said on Monday it would merge with U.S.-based Aura Consolidated Group, in a deal that gives the tech firm an implied valuation of A$972 million ($675.64 million).】

item.title: 欧元区1月制造业活动萎缩但产出反弹，PMI数据显示
item.description: 一项调查显示，尽管产出已恢复增长，但由于新订单持续疲软，欧元区1月份制造业活动连续第三个月处于萎缩区间。【原文：Euro zone factory activity remained in contraction territory in January for the third straight month amid persistent weakness in new orders despite output returning to growth, a survey showed.】

item.title: 欧洲央行调查显示欧元区企业利润持续恶化
item.description: 欧洲央行周一发布的季度企业融资状况调查显示，欧元区企业预计本季度收入将继续增长，但盈利能力正受到冲击。【原文：Euro zone firms expect revenues to keep rising this quarter but profitability is taking a hit, the European Central Bank's quarterly Survey on the Access to Finance of Enterprises showed on Monday.】

item.title: 日本首相高市早苗必须先赢得债券投资者的信任，才能赢得选民的支持。
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗在本周末提前大选前的最后冲刺阶段面临关键的市场考验，她希望通过决定性胜利获得推行扩张性财政政策的授权。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi faces a crucial markets test in the final run-up to a snap election this weekend where she is hoping a decisive victory will give her a mandate for expansionary fiscal policy.】

item.title: 日本TDK公司表示受中国稀土限制措施影响，正推进业务多元化
item.description: 日本电子元件制造商TDK周一表示，该公司正受到中国对稀土出口限制的影响，并正在采取措施实现采购渠道多元化。【原文：Japan components manufacturer TDK said on Monday that it is being affected by Chinese export restrictions on rare earths and is taking steps to diversify its procurement sources.】

item.title: 新兴市场股票涨势在1月份资金涌入后似乎依然稳固
item.description: 1月份，全球投资者以数年来的最快速度向新兴市场股票注入资金。美元走软以及投资者寻求分散投资以减少对美国的依赖，都预示着该资产类别去年掀起的涨势将延续。【原文：Global investors poured money into emerging market stocks at the fastest clip in years in January, as a weaker dollar and diversification away from the U.S. point to an extension of the rally the asset class staged last year.】

item.title: BlueFive Capital完成30亿美元Onyx基金I募集，重点投资欧美科技领域
item.description: BlueFive Capital周一宣布，其30亿美元的Onyx基金I已完成募集，该基金将重点投资于欧美地区的科技领域机会型及成长型项目。【原文：BlueFive Capital closed its $3 billion Onyx Fund I, it said on Monday, targeting opportunistic technology and growth investments in the U.S. and Europe.】

item.title: 欧洲9550亿美元复苏基金力图推动经济转型
item.description: 在遍布西班牙的橄榄园和葡萄园中，由欧洲战后马歇尔计划以来规模最大的复苏基金资助的传感器和无人机正收集土壤数据，这些数据将输入人工智能模型，帮助农民更有效地管理作物。【原文：In olive groves and vineyards dotted across Spain, sensors and drones paid for by Europe's largest recovery fund since the post-war Marshall Plan are gathering soil data to feed into AI models which will help farmers better manage their crops.】

item.title: 大宗商品暴跌引发全球市场震荡
item.description: 大宗商品市场暴跌，黄金、白银、原油及工业金属领跌。凯文·沃什被选为下一任美联储主席的消息引发风险资产抛售潮，贵金属连续第二个交易日重挫。【原文：Commodities markets slumped, led by deep losses in gold, silver, oil and industrial metals as the choice of Kevin Warsh as the next Fed chair set off a wave of selling in risk assets that sent precious metals tumbling for a second session.】

item.title: 中国房地产市场出现希望迹象？开发商称并非如此
item.description: 中国陷入困境的房地产市场近期迎来一系列积极消息，但私营房地产开发商和分析师均警告称，该行业仍面临资金困境，且在需求疲软的背景下，房价持续走低。【原文：China's embattled property market has had a recent run of positive headlines, but private real estate developers and analysts alike caution that the sector remains beset by funding challenges and long-declining prices amid soft demand.】

item.title: 中国为支撑负债累累的房地产行业所采取的措施
item.description: 中国房地产市场曾一度占据这个全球第二大经济体四分之一的份额，自2021年中期以来便深陷债务危机，导致大批开发商出现违约。【原文：China's property market, which at its peak once accounted for a quarter of the world's second-largest economy, has been struggling with a debt crisis since mid-2021 that has seen swathes of developers default on payments.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商极星汽车完成4亿美元股权融资
item.description: 电动汽车制造商极星周一宣布，已获得由三井住友银行和渣打银行合并组建的特殊目的实体Feathertop Funding Limited提供的4亿美元股权投资。【原文：Electric vehicle maker Polestar said on Monday it has secured a $400 million equity investment from Feathertop Funding Limited, a special purpose entity consolidated by Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation and Standard Chartered Bank.】

item.title: 瑞银集团公布2025年净利润达9.88亿美元
item.description: 瑞士银行宝盛周一公布2025财年净利润为7.64亿瑞士法郎（约合9.88亿美元），较2024年下降25%，但略高于市场普遍预期的6.79亿法郎。【原文：Swiss bank Julius Baer on Monday reported a net profit of 764 million Swiss francs ($988 million) for 2025, down 25% from 2024, but slightly above a consensus expectation of 679 million francs.】

item.title: 独家：巴里卡乐宝首席执行官因可可业务高层分歧离职
item.description: 两位消息人士向路透社透露，全球最大巧克力制造商巴里·卡乐伯公司及其前首席执行官彼得·费尔德上月分道扬镳，此前该公司高层就剥离可可业务的提议发生过未公开的冲突。【原文：Barry Callebaut and its former CEO Peter Feld parted ways last month after a previously unreported clash at the top of the world's largest chocolate maker over a proposal to separate its cocoa business, two sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 摩根大通预计年底金价将达每盎司6300美元，因央行及投资者需求强劲
item.description: 摩根大通周日晚间表示，预计央行和投资者的需求将推动金价在年底前升至每盎司6300美元。【原文：JP Morgan said late on Sunday it expects demand from central banks and investors to drive gold prices to $6,300 per ounce by year-end.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴斥资4.31亿美元推进春节人工智能战略，聊天机器人之战日趋白热化
item.description: 阿里巴巴周一宣布，将在春节假期期间斥资30亿元人民币（约合4.31亿美元）吸引用户使用其问问AI应用，这使得中国最大科技公司之间的竞争进一步加剧。【原文：Alibaba said on Monday it will spend 3 billion yuan ($431 million) to attract users to its Qwen AI app during the Lunar New Year holiday, heating up a race between China's largest tech firms.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：金属价格大幅下跌，因多空头头寸被挤压
item.description: 韦恩·科尔带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole】

item.title: 日本顶级商业游说团体邀请激进基金艾略特参与公司治理对话
item.description: 日本最大的商业游说团体经团联已邀请激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司于3月5日举行非公开会议，讨论公司治理问题。路透社获得的经团联致会员企业通知显示了这一安排。【原文：Japan's biggest business lobby, Keidanren, has invited activist investor Elliott Investment Management ‌to a private meeting on March 5 to discuss issues of corporate governance, it told member firms in a notice seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 快讯：贵金属暴跌引发连锁反应，市场全面下挫
item.description: 周一亚洲交易时段，贵金属价格暴跌引发市场全面下挫，导致过去一年表现最佳的众多股票遭遇大范围抛售。【原文：A collapse in precious metals spilled over into broad markets in Asian trading on Monday, prompting broad selling of many of the top-performing stocks of the past year.】

item.title: 从日本到巴西，选民可能在关键选举年撼动市场
item.description: 从日本到巴西，今年即将举行的选举可能为市场增添更多不确定性，而这些市场早已因美国政策动荡和地缘政治紧张局势加剧而备受冲击。【原文：From Japan to Brazil, elections could add yet more uncertainty this year to markets already whipped by U.S. policy gyrations and heightened geopolitical tension.】

item.title: 航空业领袖应对产业与地缘政治逆风
item.description: 航空业领袖们在周一新加坡航展开幕前夕，共同探讨了制约行业发展的障碍及地缘政治紧张局势的影响，同时重申了降低排放的承诺。【原文：Aviation leaders tackled barriers to growth and the impact of geopolitical tensions on the eve of the Singapore Airshow on Monday, while reaffirming pledges to reduce emissions.】

item.title: 全球经济：亚洲制造业活动因强劲全球需求而扩张
item.description: 亚洲制造业活动在1月份扩张，因强劲的全球需求提振了出口订单，周一公布的私营部门调查显示，这为政策制定者提供了一定程度的保证，即美国提高关税带来的冲击目前已告一段落。【原文：Asia's factory activity ​expanded in January as solid global demand lifted export orders, private-sector surveys ‌showed on Monday, offering policymakers some assurance the hit from higher U.S. tariffs has run its course for now.】

item.title: 阿根廷以8.08亿美元从美国购买提款权以偿还国际货币基金组织债务，媒体报道称
item.description: 阿根廷从美国财政部购买了8.08亿美元的特别提款权（SDR），用于支付给国际货币基金组织（IMF）的利息款项，当地报纸《民族报》周日报道称。【原文：Argentina bought $808 million in Special ​Drawing Rights (SDRs)from the U.S. ‌Treasury to meet an interest payment to the International Monetary Fund (IMF), local newspaper ‌La Nacion reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所提高保证金后，黄金白银抛售加剧
item.description: 周一，金银价格延续跌势。此前芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group）上调保证金要求，因上周贵金属遭遇抛售潮——美国总统特朗普提名凯文·沃什接任美联储主席引发市场动荡。【原文：Gold and silver extended ​falls on Monday after CME Group raised margin requirements following a sharp selloff in precious metals last ‌week on U.S. President Donald Trump's nomination of Kevin Warsh to be the next Federal Reserve chair.】

item.title: 对中国猪肉不满，中国希望回归黑猪养殖
item.description: 高向华今年是个快乐的妈妈，因为她知道家里的青少年孩子们会争先恐后地吃完她为春节大餐炖煮的五花肉。【原文：Gao Xianghua is a happy mom this year because she knows her teenage kids will eagerly finish the pork belly she is braising for the Lunar New Year feast.】

item.title: 彭博社报道称，迪士尼董事会即将任命主题公园业务主管达马罗为下一任首席执行官
item.description: 据彭博社周日援引知情人士报道，华特迪士尼董事会即将提拔主题公园部门主席乔希·达马罗担任首席执行官一职，并将于下周投票表决任命新任首席执行官人选。【原文：The board of Walt Disney is close to promoting theme-park division chairman Josh D'Amaro to the role of chief executive officer and will vote on naming a new leader next week, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲股市震荡，金属价格剧烈波动，企业财报季临近
item.description: 亚洲股市周一普遍跟随华尔街期货走低，白银市场的混乱交易令本周开局充满紧张情绪。本周将密集公布企业财报、央行会议及重要经济数据。【原文：Asian share markets mostly followed Wall Street futures lower on Monday as chaotic trading in silver made for a nervous start to a week ​that is packed with corporate earnings, central bank meetings and major economic data.】
